Actions.Name: Bloody Fuller
Effects: Deals damage again to attack target and all foes adjacent to the attack target, hit or miss, equal to 2 times the round number.

Actions.Name: March of the Imperium
Actions.Effects: Either the [name] or an adjacent ally rushes 1, then deals 2 damage to all adjacent foes and shoves them 1. This can affect the same foe more than once.

Combo.Name: Arken Impaler
Combo.Description: An adjacent foe is shoved 3. The [name] rushes after the target, following it, ending adjacent if possible.
Combo.Collide: Foe is also slashed and takes [fray] damage.

Actions.Name: Supreme Formation
Actions.Description: All allies everywhere may rush 1 space closer to this character. Bloodied allies gain 2 vigor.

Actions.Name: Execute
Actions.Description: A foe in range at 25% HP or lower must save. On a failed save, they are defeated, ignoring all other effects. On a successful save, they are reduced to 1 hp.
